answerText: Gabriel Garcia Marquez [prompt on Marquez][10] That story was taken from part of this Garcia Marquez novel, in which Aureliano Buendia fails to save Erendira after pitying her condition. It is set in Macondo.
heading: Missiles of October |2011 | 6 | 7 | Literature | World | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: In one of this author's stories, Ulises stabs the title character's "heartless grandmother," who starts spewing green blood. For 10 points each: [10] Name this author who expanded a subplot of his most famous novel into "Innocent Erendira," whose protagonist must prostitute herself to countless men every night after accidentally burning down her house.
